DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to understand safety (e.g., occurrence of adverse drug reactions [ADRs]) and efficacy data on the long-term use of Vyndaqel Capsules (hereinafter referred to as Vyndaqel) in all patients who received this drug under actual use conditions after its marketing.
DOC.brief_title: Vyndaqel Drug Use Investigation (Regulatory Post Marketing Commitment Plan)
DOC.detailed_description: Both prospective and retrospective is acceptable All the patients whom an investigator prescribes Vyndaqel should be registered
DOC.criteria: The subjects of this surveillance are all patients who received Vyndaqel. Patients not receive Vyndaqel.
